Combat
Hit Points: 125 Initiative: +2 Armor Class: 20 Attacks Per Round: 4 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +16/+19/+18 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +19/35

Armor: Hide Shield: Light Wooden Weapons: Hand Crossbow (+15 d4+2 x2@19 R30'); Morningstar (+19 d8+3 x2@20); Unarmed (+19 d3+3 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +32
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dodge: +1 AC/+1 CMD
Greater Shield Focus: +1 AC
Nonproficient Weapon Penalty.Hand Crossbow: -4 attack
Shield Focus: +1 AC
Shield Specialization (Buckler): +3 CMD
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Weapon Focus (Hand Crossbow): +1 Hand Crossbow Attack Modifier
Weapon Specialization (Hand Crossbow): +2 Hand Crossbow Damage Modifier
Bashing Finish: May make a free shield bash after crit
Blind-Fight: May reroll miss due to concealment/Invisible foe gains no melee bonus/Requires no skill check to move full speed when blinded
Bloody Assault: May suffer -5 attack to inflict 1d4 HP/rd bleed damage (DC 15 Heal or magical healing ends)
Bodyguard: May use AOO for an aid another action that gives an adjacent ally +2 AC
Bull Rush Strike: May push foe on a crit confirm that exceeds foe CMD
Careful Claw: Reduces contact damage from a natural attack by 8
Charge Through: May attempt a free overrun during charge; failure ends charge
Combat Expertise: May suffer up to -5 attack to gain equal AC bonus
Combat Patrol: May use a full-round action to increase threat area by 15'
Combat Reflexes: May take AOO while flat-footed and 3 AOO/rd
Covering Defense: Total defense action gives +1 AC to an adjacent ally
Crippling Critical: Crit reduces foe speed by half for 1 min (DC 26 Fort 1d4 rd)
Critical Focus: +4 crit confirm
Crossbow Mastery: May reload a crossbow as a free action w/out provoking AOO
Dazing Assault: May suffer -5 attack to daze w/hit (DC 26 Fort neg)
Disarming Strike: May disarm foe on a crit confirm that exceeds foe CMD
Disrupting Shot: R30' Casting opponent suffers +4 concentration DC from a successful readied ranged attack
Disruptive: +4 foe defensive spell DC
Dreadful Carnage: R30' Successful Intimidation check demoralizes foes after reducing a foe to 0 or negative HP
Focused Shot: R30' +2 HP damage on a bow or crossbow attack
Following Step: May use Step Up to move 10'
Furious Focus: Suffers no penalty on first attack using two-handed Power Attack
Gang Up: Always considered flanking when two allies threaten the same foe
Greater Blind-Fight: Suffers no miss chance from foe concealment, 20% miss chance from total concealment; located unseen attacker gains no ranged attack bonus
Greater Dirty Trick: +2 dirty trick CMB (+4 total w/Improved Dirty Trick)/Dirty Trick penalty lasts 1d4 rd + 1 rd/5 over target CMD and requires a standard action to remove
Greater Drag: +2 drag CMB (+4 total w/Improved Drag)/Drag target provokes AOO
Greater Reposition: +2 reposition CMB (+4 total w/Improved Reposition)/Reposition target provokes AOO
Greater Shield Specialization (Buckler): +2 AC vs. crit (+4 total w/Shield Specialization (Buckler)); may negate crit 1/dy
Greater Steal: +2 steal CMB (+4 total w/Improved Steal)/Target does not notice a successful steal until after combat
Improved Blind-Fight: Suffers no miss chance from foe concealment; R30' located unseen attacker gains no ranged attack bonus
Improved Bull Rush: Bull Rush provokes no AOO, gains +2 Bull Rush check and CMD
Improved Dirty Trick: May perform a dirty trick w/out provoking AOO/+2 dirty trick CMB and CMD
Improved Disarm: Disarm provokes no AOO, gains +2 Disarm check and CMD
Improved Drag: May perform drag w/out provoking AOO/+2 drag CMB and CMD
Improved Overrun: Overrun provokes no AOO, gains +2 Overrun check and CMD, and foe cannot avoid Overrun
Improved Reposition: May perform reposition w/out provoking AOO/+2 reposition CMB and CMD
Improved Second Chance: May make remaining attacks of a full-attack action after Second Chance, suffering a -5 penalty
Improved Shield Bash: Suffers no AC penalty when using Shield Bash
Improved Steal: May perform a steal w/out provoking AOO/+2 Steal CMB and CMD
Improved Sunder: Sunder provokes no AOO, gains +2 Sunder check and CMD
Improved Trip: Trip provokes no AOO, gains +2 Trip check and CMD
In Harm's Way: May suffer all damage from an attack aimed at an adjacent ally when using aid another
Missile Shield: Suffers no damage from a ranged hit 1/rd
Mobility: +4 AC vs. movement AOO
Mounted Combat: Successful Ride skill check (DC foe attack roll) negates mount damage 1/rd
Mounted Shield: +3 mount AC and Ride checks to avoid mount damage
Mounted Skirmisher: May take a full-attack action during mount move
Natural Savagery: +3 attack and damage w/natural weapons and grapple CMB/CMD
Parting Shot: May make a ranged attack during withdraw action 1/encounter
Point-Blank Master: Using chosen ranged weapon while threatened provokes no AOO
Point-Blank Shot: +1 ranged attack and damage w/in 30'
Power Attack: May suffer -5 attack to gain +10 damage (+15 when wielding weapon w/two hands)
Precise Shot: Suffers no penalty on shot into melee
Pushing Assault: May trade Power Attack damage bonus for 5' push (crit 10')
Rapid Reload (Hand): May reload a hand crossbow as a free action
Rapid Shot: May make normal and extra ranged attacks at a -2 penalty
Ray Shield: Shield absorbs damage from a ranged touch hit 1/rd
Repositioning Strike: May move foe w/crit confirm that exceeds foe CMD
Savage Charge: May suffer -8 AC to gain +8 bull rush and overrun and make a +8 attack w/a natural weapon at end of a charge
Saving Shield: May use shield to give an adjacent ally +2 AC
Second Chance: May forego additional attacks of a full-attack action to reroll a miss on the first attack
Shield Master: No penalty on shield attacks/May apply shield enhancements to attack and damage
Shield Of Swings: May reduce two-handed weapon full-attack action damage by half to gain +4 AC and CMD
Shield Slam: Shield Bash inflicts Bull Rush
Shield Specialization (Buckler)-1: +2 AC vs. crit
Shot On The Run: May move before and after ranged attack
Spellbreaker: May take AOO after foe failed defensive casting
Step Up And Strike: May make AOO after Step Up
Step Up: May match foe 5' step
Stunning Assault: May suffer -5 attack to inflict 1 rd stun (DC 26 Fort neg)
Sundering Strike: May damage foe weapon w/crit confirm that exceeds foe CMD
Swift Aid: Aid another as a swift action gives ally +1 AC or +1 on next attack
Team Up: May use aid another as a move action when self and 2 allies threaten same foe
Teleport Tactician: Foe teleporting to or from a threatened square provokes AOO
Trick Riding: In light or no armor, may negate 2 hits on mount/rd using Mounted Combat
Tripping Strike: May inflict trip w/crit confirm that exceeds foe CMD
Two-Weapon Fighting: Reduces on-hand penalty by 2 and off-hand by 6
